pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.title: Plans tailored to your size
pricing.subtitle: Start small, grow with us
pricing.guarantee: 30-day satisfaction guarantee - If you're not satisfied, we'll refund you. No questions asked.

items.question: How long does it take to deploy FleetOps Pro?
items.answer: 48 hours to be operational. Our team configures your account, imports your existing data, and trains your teams. No infrastructure needed - everything is cloud-based. For enterprise deployments with complex integrations, allow 2-4 weeks.

items.question: Does it work with my current system (Odoo, SAP, Excel)?
items.answer: Yes, we integrate with everything. Odoo, SAP, Sage, Salesforce, and even your Excel files. Our Integration module connects your existing systems in real-time. No need to change everything - we adapt to you.

items.question: What ROI can I expect?
items.answer: On average, our clients see a positive ROI within 6 months: -40% on maintenance costs, -60% on admin management time, +35% productivity. For a 50-vehicle fleet, that's about EUR 50,000 in annual savings.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Maximum security. Hosted on certified servers in Europe, AES-256 encryption, GDPR compliant, automatic daily backups. Your data belongs to you - full export available at any time.

items.question: Is there a minimum commitment?
items.answer: No long-term commitment. Monthly subscription, cancellable at any time. We bet on the quality of our product, not on contracts that trap you. 14-day free trial available.
